channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Athletics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Athletics

item.title: CVE-2022-1549|2024-08-03T00:10:03.671Z -- unknown -- wp%20athletics
item.description: The WP Athletics WordPress plugin through 1.1.7 does not sanitize parameters before storing them in the database, nor does it escape the values when outputting them back in the admin dashboard, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability.
